NANOBANANA.ToolHint: Drag to select a region of the map to edit with AI
NANOBANANA.SettingsApiUrlHint: The base URL of your NanoBanana2 (Stable Diffusion WebUI) API server (e.g. http://127.0.0.1:7860)
NANOBANANA.SettingsDenoisingStrengthHint: Controls how much the image is changed. Lower values keep more of the original (0.0-1.0)
NANOBANANA.SettingsStepsHint: Number of sampling steps for image generation
NANOBANANA.SettingsCfgScaleHint: How strongly the prompt influences the output
NANOBANANA.SettingsNegativePromptHint: Default negative prompt appended to all requests
NANOBANANA.DialogPromptPlaceholder: Describe how you want to modify this area...
NANOBANANA.DialogNegativePlaceholder: What to avoid in the generated image...
NANOBANANA.ErrorNoApi: NanoBanana2 API URL is not configured. Please set it in Module Settings.
NANOBANANA.ErrorApiFailed: Failed to communicate with NanoBanana2 API: {error}
NANOBANANA.ErrorCaptureFailed: Failed to capture the selected region.
